UIServerStartAuto: Start server automatically when external tool window opens
UISecAllowClientControl: Allow client control (pause, frame advance, reset core, turbo, etc)
UISecAllowJoypad: Allow joypad/system input (buttons, control stick, reset button, etc)
UISecAllowSavestate: Allow saving and loading save states
UIStatusNotInitialized: Config not initialized, no updates happening...
UIStatusServerRunning: Server running on {0}:{1} since {2} ({3} commands processed)
UICloseTitle: Are you sure you want to exit TASauria?
UICloseDescription:
The TASauria server can only interact with the emulator while this external tool window is open.
If you close it, the server will be automatically stopped.
Are you sure you want to exit TASauria?
